calendar_events.title: 2025 November & December Grand Prix Dining Experience
calendar_events.description:
Join World Equestrian Center – Ocala on Saturday nights during the 2025 November & December Series for the Grand Prix Dining Experience presented by Wheels Up.  

With a table offering the most coveted view of the Grand Outdoor Arena, you can enjoy top-level equestrian sport under the lights at The Equestrian Hotel. Indulge in a three-course chef’s dinner featuring complimentary beer and wine. Attendees will enjoy an exclusive first taste with select dinner menus inspired by WEC’s new restaurants, opening soon at The Equestrian Manor. A cash bar will be available for spirits and bottles of wine from the in-house sommelier’s selections.  

Doors for the event will open at 6pm. Grand prix start times vary. Weekly menus forthcoming. 

Dates:  
November 8 | $75,000 Wheels Up Grand Prix featuring a chef-driven menu by WEC’s culinary team  
November 15 | $75,000 Dover Saddlery Grand Prix featuring a menu inspired by Genievieve’s, WEC’s new Italian restaurant  
December 6 | $120,000 Coca-Cola Beverages Florida Grand Prix CSI3* featuring a menu inspired by The Polo Pony, WEC’s new American restaurant and the ambiance of the Winter Wonderland holiday lights 
December 13 | $75,000 AdventHealth Grand Prix featuring a menu inspired by The White Willow, WEC’s new Pan-Asian restaurant and the ambiance of the Winter Wonderland holiday lights 

    Book Your Stay

calendar_events.title: WSET Level 1 in Wines Course
calendar_events.description:
The WSET Level 1 Wines is a basic level introduction to wine, for those who want to start a career in the wine business or for wine enthusiasts. In this class, we taste 9 different wines and learn about major grape varieties, wine regions, storage, and the service of wine. We also do an interesting food and wine pairing. This is an in-person, one day class that takes place from 9am to 4:30pm. Location: Arena 3 Mezzanine Suite 2

Cost: $429.00

    Book Your Stay

calendar_events.title: 2025 Fall Series – Grand Prix Dining Experience
calendar_events.description:
Join World Equestrian Center – Ocala on Saturday nights during the 2025 Fall Series for the Grand Prix Dining Experience presented by Wheels Up.  

With a table offering the most coveted view of the Grand Outdoor Arena, you can enjoy equestrian sport under the lights at The Equestrian Hotel. calendar_events.title: WEC Halloween Celebration
calendar_events.description:
Join us on Halloween night for a free spooktacular celebration on the WEC Grand Plaza from 6:30pm to 9pm on Friday, October 31.

Gather your family and embark on a trick-or-treating adventure, parade through the plaza on the way to cookie and pumpkin decorating, capture family memories with a photo op and enjoy live music and spirited entertainment from our talented balloon artist and face painter.   

Don’t miss the Hocus Pawcus Canine Costume Contest the weekend before on Saturday, October 25.

    Book Your Stay

calendar_events.title: 2025 Hocus Pawcus Canine Costume Contest
calendar_events.description:
Come out to World Equestrian Center – Ocala Saturday, October 25 from 5pm to 7pm for a barking good time at the third annual Hocus Pawcus Canine Costume Contest in Exposition Center 2. This free event is a chance to dress your pup in their Halloween best and compete for cash prizes, dog swag, WEC merchandise and more. Final selection for winners will take place live at 6:45pm.

Spend the evening with your favorite furry friends and enjoy canine vendors and entertainment, as well as all your fall favorites for humans and pups from the WEC concessions and cash bars. Meet adoptable dogs from VOCAL and celebrate spooky season with us at this free event!

Pre-registration is encouraged in advance online. Walk-up participants will be accepted as space allows.

Please Note:

  • Dogs must wear a collar with ID tags and remain leashed and attended to at all times  
  • Dogs must be current on all required vaccinations 
  • Please refrain from bringing in-tact male dogs, female dogs in heat or puppies less than 8-weeks old 
  • Owners will be responsible for all actions and any damages caused by their dogs
  • Owners must clean up after their dogs 

    Book Your Stay

calendar_events.title: WEC Vaulting Premiere | CVI3* World Cup™ Qualifier, CVI2*, CVI1*, USEF/EVUSA
calendar_events.description:
World Equestrian Center — Ocala (WEC) is thrilled to announce the WEC Vaulting Premiere, the venue’s first-ever Vaulting competition, taking place November 28–30, 2025, in the iconic WEC Stadium. Entries are now open, and the official prize list is available. All entries must be submitted by October 20, 2025.

The WEC Vaulting Premiere kicks off on Friday, November 28 with international divisions including FEI CVI3* World Cup™ Qualifier, CVI2*, and CVI1*. The competition continues through the weekend with USEF/EVUSA-sanctioned classes, including EVUSA Level 1 recognized competition on November 29–30.

A full competition schedule for spectators will be released closer to the event.

*Times subject to change.

calendar_events.title: Labor Day Barrel Blast
calendar_events.description:
Spectators are welcome at the 2025 Labor Day Barrel Blast, held August 28 through September 1 in Indoor Arena 5 at World Equestrian Center – Ocala.

Admission and parking are free. View the full schedule. Note: start and end times are subject to change.

With more than $39,000 in added prize money, the Labor Day Barrel Blast showcases Youth (12 & under) and Teen (13–18) divisions, with top riders advancing to the Super Monday Finals on September 1. Exhibitions (practice) will be held on Thursday, August 28, with warm-up classes and competition beginning Friday, August 29, followed by go-rounds on Saturday and Sunday and Finals on Labor Day Monday.

Entries and stall reservations remain open through Saddlebook.com.

This is a great opportunity to view and select the RV of your dreams from over 100 pre-owned motorhomes and adventure vans that are on display. There is no charge for parking or admission. We will take your trade-in and can offer you a number of financing options for your new RV.

The sale runs Thursday thru Sunday, August 28-31. Hours are 9:00 a.m. to 7 pm each day. Location: Expo Center 2

Discover great values in used RVs from Tiffin, Fleetwood, Jayco, Entegra, Roadtrek, Storyteller Overland, Thor Motor Coach and Winnebago and more.

calendar_events.title: 2025 Ocala December Show Series II: Premier Hunter/Level 6 Jumper
calendar_events.description:
World Equestrian Center – Ocala is pleased to announce the dates for the 2025 November and December Show Series, featuring two weeks of USEF-sanctioned hunter/jumper competition each month.

The December series will include Fédération Equestre Internationale (FEI) CSI3* and CSI1* competition during Week I, scheduled for December 2–7. The CSI1* offers a valuable qualifying opportunity for young athletes on the path to the 2026 Youth Olympic Games in Dakar, Senegal.

2025 November and December Show Series Dates:

November I: 11/5-11/9
National Hunter/Level 6 Jumper 

November II: 11/12-11/16
National Hunter/Level 6 Jumper 

December I: 12/2-12/7
CSI3*, CSI1*/Premier Hunter/Level 6 Jumper 

December II: 12/10-12/14
Premier Hunter/Level 6 Jumper 

During November I, exhibitors and guests can enjoy the Ocala Food & Wine Festival, a chef-led culinary celebration November 7-9 featuring culinary competition, beer, wine and spirits education and samples of extraordinary cuisine. Tickets on sale soon at ocalafoodandwinefest.com. 

World Equestrian Center – Ocala’s popular holiday celebration, Winter Wonderland, will return during the December series. 

Entries and the prize list will be released at a later date. 

    Book Your Stay

calendar_events.title: 2025 Ocala Food & Wine Festival
calendar_events.description:
The Ocala Food & Wine Festival is a three-day, chef-led culinary celebration featuring culinary competition, beer, wine and spirits education and samples of extraordinary cuisine. Event proceeds benefit the Public Education Foundation of Marion County ProStart Program.  

Experience three days of exceptional cuisine at World Equestrian Center – Ocala . This exclusive weekend is your invitation to savor the season with renowned chefs, elegant events and world-class accommodations. 

Make the most of the weekend with the Five-Star Festival Package, offering exclusive access to the Chefs’ Dinner. Book the package to fully immerse yourself in gourmet cuisine and luxurious comfort.

calendar_events.title: 2025 Summer Series: Grand Prix Dining Experience
calendar_events.description:
Join World Equestrian Center – Ocala on Saturday nights during the 2025 Summer Series for the Grand Prix Dining Experience presented by Wheels Up.

With a table offering the most coveted view of the Grand Outdoor Arena, you can enjoy top-level equestrian sport under the lights at The Equestrian Hotel. Indulge in a three-course chef’s dinner featuring complimentary beer and wine. A cash bar will be available for spirits and bottles of wine from the in-house sommelier’s selections. Doors for the event will open at 6:30pm. Grand Prix start times vary.

Full circuit tables are available for purchase through June 14 to enjoy nine weeks of Saturday night grands prix.

calendar_events.description:
Join us at the 3rd Annual Ocala Holiday Craft Show, an enchanting three-day event featuring over 350 talented artists and crafters. Explore an array of unique creations, from beautiful wreaths and home decor to candles, artwork, jewelry, holiday decor, and mouthwatering foods.

Discover the key to a healthier, happier you at the 2nd Annual Ocala Health & Wellness Expo! Join us for this exciting, free community event designed to empower your health journey with valuable insights, innovative products, and expert guidance.

Connect with over 100 diverse vendors showcasing the latest in fitness, nutrition, wellness services, holistic care, health technology, and much more. calendar_events.title: Ocala Pet Palooza
calendar_events.description:
The Ocala Pet Palooza is the pet lovers' place to be! Our 3rd Annual event is going to be a blast, with dock diving, costume & best trick contests, a lure course and so much more! Come shop for your furry, feathered, or scaly friends. This indoor event will attract thousands of pet lovers looking to enjoy a day out with their furry friends! It's also the perfect place to give a loving home to an animal in need as local rescues and shelters will have animals on site for adoption.

Play | Shop | Learn | Adopt

Advance tickets are $7+ tax and fees or $10 at the door. Discounts for seniors and military. Children 12 and under are free.

Leashed, well-behaved animals who are up to date on vaccinations are welcome to attend.

Free Parking

calendar_events.title: 2025 Ocala Summer Series IX: CSI3* / National Hunter / Level 6 Jumper
calendar_events.description:
2025 Summer Series | June 4 – August 10, 2025

Join us this summer for 10 weeks of top hunter/jumper competition, including nine weeks of international competition in the WEC Grand Arena. Enjoy world-class equestrian sport in the comfort of six air-conditioned indoor arenas. Indoor Arena 5 now features upgraded GGT footing.

Competition runs Wednesday through Sunday each week, with classes beginning at 8am. End times vary each day based on the number of entries. Weekly schedules can be found at the links below and will include class counts, orders of go, and estimated start times—available closer to each event.

The South Standlee/USHJA National Hunter Derby Regional Championship returns to WEC – Ocala during Week II, June 17-22. The championship will feature three derbies: open, junior and amateur, each boasting $12,500 in prize money. Set in the prestigious WEC Stadium, this regional championship provides hunter riders with a prime opportunity to compete in a grand setting ahead of the Platinum Performance/USHJA International Hunter Derby Championship and USHJA Green Hunter Incentive Championship in August.

2025 Summer Series Schedule:

Summer Series Opener 6/4/25-6/8/25: Regional Hunter / Level 3 Jumper
Summer Series I 6/10/25-6/15/25: CSI2* / Premier Hunter / Level 6 Jumper
Summer Series II 6/17/25-6/22/25: CSI3* / Premier Hunter / Level 6 Jumper
Summer Series III 6/24/25-6/29/25: CSI4*, CSI2* / Premier Hunter / Level 6 Jumper
Summer Series IV 7/1/25-7/6/25: CSI2* / National Hunter / Level 6 Jumper
Summer Series V 7/8/25-7/13/25: CSI3* / Premier Hunter / Level 6 Jumper
Summer Series VI 7/15/25-7/20/25: CSI3* / Premier Hunter / Level 6 Jumper
Summer Series VII 7/22/25-7/27/25: CSI2* / Premier Hunter / Level 6 Jumper
Summer Series VIII 7/29/25-8/3/25: CSI2* / Premier Hunter / Level 6 Jumper
Summer Series IX 8/5/25-8/10/25: CSI3* / National Hunter / Level 6 Jumper

    Book Your Stay

calendar_events.title: Melissa Lee at the Yellow Pony
calendar_events.description:
Join us at the Yellow Pony for dinner, drinks and entertainment from Melissa Lee. A little bit country, a little bit rock n' roll, Melissa Lee is a stylistically innovative 25-year-old super star on the rise playing songs so catchy they'll be stuck in your head all day.

    Book Your Stay

calendar_events.title: Passport to Paris
calendar_events.description:
Embark on a journey to Paris, France at the second event in the 2025 Stirrups Wine Series. Join us on the terrace for an elegant evening exploring the wine, cuisine and culture of Paris and its surrounding regions under the glow of the holiday lights. 

From iconic French reds to sparkling Champagnes, attendees will sample a curated selection in celebration of French wine offered in Paris along with small plates that showcase the refined and classic flavors of French cuisine. Enjoy live music and insights from our master sommelier. 

    Book Your Stay

calendar_events.title: WEC December Dressage presented by Hampton Green Farms CDI-W/USEF/USDF
calendar_events.description:
The 2025 dressage competition calendar, sponsored by Hampton Green Farm, at World Equestrian Center – Ocala (WEC) is set to feature an impressive lineup of 10 shows including seven Fédération Equestre International (FEI)-rated events.

The 2025 slate of FEI-rated competitions, which run alongside national US Equestrian (USEF)/United States Dressage Federation (USDF) shows, will include four CDI3* shows, two CDI4* events and FEI Dressage World Cup™ qualifier in December. Each event will also provide qualifying opportunities for the Great American Insurance Group/USDF Region 3 Dressage Championships. The August shows will also be qualifiers for the 2026 FEI North American Youth Championships.

2025 Dressage Dates:

January 30-February 2, 2025: CDI3*/USEF/USDF competition

February 13-16, 2025: CDI3*/USEF/USDF competition

March 5-9, 2025: CDI4*/USEF/USDF competition

April 9-13, 2025: CDI4*/USEF/USDF competition

May 22-25, 2025: CDI3*/USEF/USDF competition

July 12-13, 2025: USEF/USDF competition

August 22-24, 2025: Two USEF/USDF competitions

October 18-19, 2025: USEF/USDF competition

November 12-16, 2025: CDI3*/USEF/USDF competition

December 10-14, 2025: CDI-W/USEF/USDF competition

For all questions regarding upcoming dressage competition, contact dressage@wec.net.

  • Learn More
